entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023
